bug.author: linmajia
bug.summary: Keras >= 2.2.5 does not have the keras.backend.image_dim_ordering() function any more.
bug.description:
In Keras >= 2.0.0, we should use the new API: image_data_format(). Please refer to:
https://github.com/keras-team/keras/wiki/Keras-2.0-release-notes keras-team/keras#12649
